text: Egha ingangarimɨn garir gumaziba kamaghɨn aning mɨgei, “Gua e gamizɨ datɨrɨghɨn e mati atrivim ko an gumazir dapanibar atinimɨn mughuriam atɨ. Egha me e mɨsoghtɨ e ovengamin tuavim akɨrigha gɨfa. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Ikiavɨra Itir God guan arazir kamɨn ganigha gɨfa, egh guan arazir kamɨn ivezir kuram gua danɨngam.”
